bridge-type.label: AMS/ADS Network
bridge-type.description: Defines AMS network identifier for this instance.

parameter.name: sourceAmsId
parameter.label: Source AMS Network Id
parameter.description: Routing information for requests. In order to communicate any PLC a virtual AMS Net Id address must be set.

parameter.name: sourceAmsPort
parameter.label: Source AMS port
parameter.description: Value for Source AMS port for making requests to other devices (by default 30000).

parameter.name: ipAddress
parameter.label: Broadcast address
parameter.description: Address used to send and receive AMS messages.

parameter.name: broadcastAddress
parameter.label: Broadcast address
parameter.description: Address used to send broadcast messages to discover devices.

parameter-group.name: authentication
parameter-group.label: Authentication
parameter-group.description: Authentication information is optional. It is used to setup AMS routing table on contacted device before making connection attempt. If you don't know if PLC already have route or you run this integration under Linux it is highly recommended to set these values.

parameter.name: username
parameter.label: Username
parameter.description: Username used to contact PLC to setup AMS/ADS route.

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: Password used to setup AMS/ADS route.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port number
parameter.description: Port number for communication, leave empty for default (48898).

parameter.name: targetAmsPort
parameter.label: Target AMS Network port
parameter.description: This is virtual port which is internally dispatched by PLC controller to running tasks or system services.

bridge-type.label: AMS/ADS Serial Bridge
bridge-type.description: Serial port connection to AMS/ADS PLC.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Serial port
parameter.description: Serial port over which connection is made - ie. /dev/ttyUSB0, /dev/ttyS1 for linux or COM0, COM1 for windows.

thing-type.label: AMS/ADS device
thing-type.description: A PLC with ADS communication capabilities which can be polled for data.

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh interval
parameter.description: Time between next poll cycles. If no value is given value defined for bridge is used (1000 ms by default).
